Keywords: Frightful Four , Sinister Syndicate
Real Name: William Baker
Special Powers
MOVEMENT: Hindering
FRIGHTFUL FOUR: DUNE SANDSTORM: UNIQUE MODIFIER - Opposing characters modify damage -1 when making a close attack that targets a friendly character with the Frightful Four keyword.
SAND BLAST: Quake, Smoke Cloud. When Sandman uses Smoke Cloud, after resolutions he can use Quake at no cost but may also target any opposing characters occupying or adjacent to his hindering markers, regardless of adjacency.

Comments
January 2, 2023
skybug
I was looking for Sinister Syndicate characters with long range, turns out theres only a small handful of old R/E/V pieces with the sin syn keyword and range over 7. It turns out SANDMAN is the best ranged attacker the syndicate has. He essentially has a range of 13 with hitting characters adjacent to his smokecloud. Imagine hitting targets around corners and walls with 13 range! Its wild how good this sandman is; If he had the Spider-man Enemy TA he would be perfect. Between this and the Earth-x piece we have 2 amazing sandmen below 100 points to choose.
May 21, 2021
Goop
Exact same stats/powers as Hydro-man so i imagine you use Wizard to switch out which one is going to be more useful against a particular opponent. Sandman is the preferred choice if you are dealing with swarm teams where quakes can wreck them. Quake is a bit better than the poison of Hydroman since you can target all those occupying your markers AND those adjacent. So you can get off some MASSIVE quakes.
